mapper.select:
SELECT commodity_id infoId, commodity_title infoName, commodity_info content, czb_file.save_path img, commodity_price price, czb_commodity.create_at publishTime, is_examine isExamine FROM czb_commodity left join czb_file on czb_commodity.commodity_img = czb_file.file_id
AND commodity_title like concat('%', #{infoName}, '%')
AND date_format(czb_commodity.create_at, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(#{publishTime}, '%Y%m%d')
AND is_examine = #{isExamine}
mapper.update: update czb_commodity set is_examine = 1 WHERE commodity_id = #{infoId}
